page.title: 09Employment in Fakenham Area
page.content: The children in our class did a survey of their Fathers' jobs. 3 children didn't have a father at home, the remaining 25 were as follows: Food Production Industry -***** Shopkeepers -**** Farm Workers -*** Out of Work -*** Farm Machinery Manufacture -** Lorry Driver -** Armed Forces (RAF) -* Police Force -* Publican -* Welder -* Painter and Decorator -* Laundry Worker -* Out of the 28 children questioned, 12 had mothers who went out to work. Of the Shopkeepers, 1 is a partner in the family jewellers, 1 owns a Fish and Chip shop and 1 is the manager of the Fakenham branch of Woolworths.
